datasets.name: 898ca196
queryLines:
SELECT
  SUM(l_extendedprice * (1 - l_discount)) AS total_revenue,
  SUM(l_extendedprice * (1 - l_discount)) / COUNT(DISTINCT l_orderkey) AS average_order_value
FROM
  lineitem;

datasets.name: 0d55c797
queryLines:
SELECT 
  concat(gross_margin_percentage, '%') as gross_margin_percentage
FROM (
SELECT
  CAST(
    (SUM((l.l_extendedprice * (1 - l.l_discount)) - (ps.ps_supplycost * l.l_quantity)) / SUM(l.l_extendedprice * (1 - l.l_discount))) * 100 
    AS DECIMAL(18, 2)
  ) AS gross_margin_percentage
FROM
  lineitem AS l
  JOIN partsupp AS ps ON l.l_partkey = ps.ps_partkey AND l.l_suppkey = ps.ps_suppkey
) a;

datasets.name: 9ddbe4f6
queryLines:
WITH revenue_by_nation AS (
  SELECT
    initcap(n.n_name) AS nation,
    SUM(l.l_extendedprice * (1 - l.l_discount)) AS revenue,
    COUNT(DISTINCT o.o_orderkey) AS total_orders,
    COUNT(DISTINCT c.c_custkey) AS total_customers
  FROM
    lineitem AS l
    JOIN orders AS o ON l.l_orderkey = o.o_orderkey
    JOIN customer AS c ON o.o_custkey = c.c_custkey
    JOIN nation AS n ON c.c_nationkey = n.n_nationkey
  GROUP BY
    nation
)
SELECT
  nation,
  revenue,
  total_orders,
  total_customers,
  CASE nation
    WHEN 'Algeria' THEN 28.0339
    WHEN 'Argentina' THEN -38.4161
    WHEN 'Brazil' THEN -14.2350
    WHEN 'Canada' THEN 56.1304
    WHEN 'China' THEN 35.8617
    WHEN 'Egypt' THEN 26.8206
    WHEN 'Ethiopia' THEN 9.1450
    WHEN 'France' THEN 46.2276
    WHEN 'Germany' THEN 51.1657
    WHEN 'India' THEN 20.5937
    WHEN 'Indonesia' THEN -0.7893
    WHEN 'Iran' THEN 32.4279
    WHEN 'Iraq' THEN 33.2232
    WHEN 'Japan' THEN 36.2048
    WHEN 'Jordan' THEN 30.5852
    WHEN 'Kenya' THEN -0.0236
    WHEN 'Morocco' THEN 31.7917
    WHEN 'Mozambique' THEN -18.6657
    WHEN 'Peru' THEN -9.1900
    WHEN 'Romania' THEN 45.9432
    WHEN 'Russia' THEN 61.5240
    WHEN 'Saudi Arabia' THEN 23.8859
    WHEN 'United Kingdom' THEN 55.3781
    WHEN 'United States' THEN 37.0902
    WHEN 'Vietnam' THEN 14.0583
  END AS latitude,
  CASE nation
    WHEN 'Algeria' THEN 1.6596
    WHEN 'Argentina' THEN -63.6167
    WHEN 'Brazil' THEN -51.9253
    WHEN 'Canada' THEN -106.3468
    WHEN 'China' THEN 104.1954
    WHEN 'Egypt' THEN 30.8025
    WHEN 'Ethiopia' THEN 40.4897
    WHEN 'France' THEN 2.2137
    WHEN 'Germany' THEN 10.4515
    WHEN 'India' THEN 78.9629
    WHEN 'Indonesia' THEN 113.9213
    WHEN 'Iran' THEN 53.6880
    WHEN 'Iraq' THEN 43.6793
    WHEN 'Japan' THEN 138.2529
    WHEN 'Jordan' THEN 36.2384
    WHEN 'Kenya' THEN 37.9062
    WHEN 'Morocco' THEN -7.0926
    WHEN 'Mozambique' THEN 35.5296
    WHEN 'Peru' THEN -75.0152
    WHEN 'Romania' THEN 24.9668
    WHEN 'Russia' THEN 105.3188
    WHEN 'Saudi Arabia' THEN 45.0792
    WHEN 'United Kingdom' THEN -3.4360
    WHEN 'United States' THEN -95.7129
    WHEN 'Vietnam' THEN 108.2772
  END AS longitude
FROM
  revenue_by_nation
ORDER BY
  revenue DESC;

datasets.name: ca425f11
queryLines:
SELECT
  r.r_name AS region,
  SUM(l.l_extendedprice * (1 - l.l_discount)) AS revenue
FROM
  lineitem AS l
  JOIN orders AS o ON l.l_orderkey = o.o_orderkey
  JOIN customer AS c ON o.o_custkey = c.c_custkey
  JOIN nation AS n ON c.c_nationkey = n.n_nationkey
  JOIN region AS r ON n.n_regionkey = r.r_regionkey
GROUP BY
  r.r_name
ORDER BY
  revenue DESC;

datasets.name: 78836fe0
queryLines:
SELECT
  c.c_name AS customer_name,
  SUM(l.l_extendedprice * (1 - l.l_discount)) AS total_spent
FROM
  lineitem AS l
  JOIN orders AS o ON l.l_orderkey = o.o_orderkey
  JOIN customer AS c ON o.o_custkey = c.c_custkey
  JOIN nation AS n ON c.c_nationkey = n.n_nationkey
WHERE
  initcap(n.n_name) = :country
GROUP BY
  c.c_name
ORDER BY
  total_spent DESC
LIMIT 10;

datasets.name: 2fdac2a7
queryLines:
SELECT
  p.p_name AS product_name,
  SUM((l.l_extendedprice * (1 - l.l_discount)) - (ps.ps_supplycost * l.l_quantity)) AS gross_profit
FROM
  lineitem l
  JOIN part p ON l.l_partkey = p.p_partkey
  JOIN partsupp ps ON l.l_partkey = ps.ps_partkey AND l.l_suppkey = ps.ps_suppkey
GROUP BY
  p.p_name
ORDER BY
  gross_profit DESC
LIMIT 5;

datasets.name: 32f7caf4
b35c3071
queryLines:
SELECT
  l.l_shipmode AS shipping_mode,
  o.o_orderpriority AS order_priority,
  COUNT(l.l_orderkey) AS number_of_items
FROM
  lineitem AS l
  JOIN orders AS o ON l.l_orderkey = o.o_orderkey
GROUP BY
  l.l_shipmode,
  o.o_orderpriority
ORDER BY
  l.l_shipmode,
  o.o_orderpriority;

datasets.name: 5b8281af
queryLines:
SELECT
  concat(ROUND(AVG(DATEDIFF(day, l_commitdate, l_shipdate)), 2), ' Days') AS avg_shipping_delay_days
FROM
  lineitem
WHERE
  l_shipdate > l_commitdate;

datasets.name: 2e4da4db
queryLines:
SELECT
  DATE_FORMAT(o.o_orderdate, 'yyyy-MM') AS order_month,
  SUM(l.l_quantity) AS total_quantity,
  SUM(l.l_extendedprice * (1 - l.l_discount)) AS total_revenue
FROM
  orders AS o
  JOIN lineitem AS l ON o.o_orderkey = l.l_orderkey
WHERE
  -- Dynamically filters for the last 12 full months
  o.o_orderdate >= ADD_MONTHS(DATE_TRUNC('MONTH', current_date()), -12)
  AND o.o_orderdate < DATE_TRUNC('MONTH', current_date())
GROUP BY
  DATE_FORMAT(o.o_orderdate, 'yyyy-MM')
ORDER BY
  order_month;

datasets.name: f768df25
datasets.displayName: Top Products by Sales in Selected Country
queryLines:
SELECT
  p.p_name AS product_name,
  SUM(l.l_extendedprice * (1 - l.l_discount)) AS total_revenue
FROM
  lineitem l
  JOIN orders o ON l.l_orderkey = o.o_orderkey
  JOIN customer c ON o.o_custkey = c.c_custkey
  JOIN nation n ON c.c_nationkey = n.n_nationkey
  JOIN part p ON l.l_partkey = p.p_partkey
WHERE
  initcap(n.n_name) = :param
GROUP BY
  p.p_name
ORDER BY
  total_revenue DESC
LIMIT 5;

datasets.name: 8de44209
queryLines:
WITH latest_year AS (
  SELECT MAX(YEAR(o_orderdate)) as max_year FROM main.valerie_demo.orders
),
monthly_revenue AS (
  SELECT
    MONTH(o.o_orderdate) AS order_month,
    YEAR(o.o_orderdate) AS order_year,
    SUM(l.l_extendedprice * (1 - l.l_discount)) AS total_revenue
  FROM
    main.valerie_demo.lineitem l
    JOIN main.valerie_demo.orders o ON l.l_orderkey = o.o_orderkey
  WHERE
    YEAR(o.o_orderdate) >= (SELECT max_year FROM latest_year) - 1
  GROUP BY
    order_year,
    order_month
)
SELECT
  order_month,
  SUM(CASE WHEN order_year = (SELECT max_year FROM latest_year) - 1 THEN total_revenue ELSE 0 END) AS last_year_revenue,
  SUM(CASE WHEN order_year = (SELECT max_year FROM latest_year) THEN total_revenue ELSE 0 END) AS this_year_revenue
FROM
  monthly_revenue
GROUP BY
  order_month
ORDER BY
  order_month;
